dct_title_s: Map of New-York Bay and Harbor and the environs / founded upon a trigonometrical survey under the direction of F.R. Hassler, superintendent of the Survey of the Coast of the United States [sheet 1 of 6]
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by soundings. "Sheets Nos. 1, 2, 3, & 4 verified by C.M. Eakin, assistant, & published in 1844. Sheets 5 & 6 verified by Lt. A.A. Humphreys, assistant, & published in 1845." Prime meridians: New York and Greenwich. Includes text, table of currents, notes, 4 coastal panoramas and 2 views of Sandy Hook Light. Historic Maps copy 2 mounted on cloth.
dct_publisher_sm: [Washington, D.C.] : Survey of the Coast of the United States, 1844-1845.
dct_subject_sm: Nautical charts—New York Harbor (N.Y. and N.J.)—1844
dcat_theme_sm: Nautical charts—New York Harbor (N.Y. and N.J.)—1844
